item.description: We'll be at The Luxury Box in Leominster (Thanks Jason!)  It is more of a pub style atmosphere.  We will be able to order dinner or apps off the nice sized menu.  Seating is spaced out a bit more than our usual situation, but we will be in a semi private area so we can walk around and visit.  Here's to trying something new! Please RSVP or change your status if you can't make it, I need to give them a final number by Thursday afternoon.  As always the restaurant prefers one check for large parties and cash.
item.how_to_find_us: Our reservation will be under me, Chris.
item.name: Atheskeptihumanist Dinner & Drinks
